channel.title: sdlc on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in sdlc on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Software Development Lifecycle Phases
item.description: An Tale of Software Development I had a great idea to help my wife maintain her massive succulent collection by building a self watering garden. This project would consist of three primary components: The soil sensor is a piece of hardware that she could place in dirt to measure the soil moisture and a small pump to water the dry soil. The controller that will collect moisture data from all the soil moisture sensors and provide a user interface to track moisture levels and manually control the pump.
